SEARCH
程序包 com.hsmkmathlib.integral.algorithm

类 Trapezoid

java.lang.Object
com.hsmkmathlib.integral.algorithm.Trapezoid
所有已实现的接口:
IntegralBase
public final class Trapezoid extends Object implements IntegralBase
This class provides an implementation of the trapezoidal rule for approximating the definite integral of a function.

  • 字段详细资料

    • INSTANCE

      public static final Trapezoid INSTANCE
      Singleton instance of the Trapezoid class.

      This instance provides a single, shared access point to the trapezoidal integration functionality offered by the Trapezoid class.

  • 方法详细资料

    • integral

      public <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integral(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, double eps)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using an adaptive integration method.
      指定者:
      integral 在接口中 IntegralBase
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function无效输入：'<'Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      eps - The desired error tolerance for the integration.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the endpoints are not in the range of the function, or if any of the endpoints or eps are NaN, or if eps is negative.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.

    • integralFixedStep

      public <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integralFixedStep(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, double step)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using the trapezoidal rule with a fixed step size.
      指定者:
      integralFixedStep 在接口中 IntegralBase
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function无效输入：'<'Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      step - The step size to use for the trapezoidal rule.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the endpoints are not in the range of the function, or if any of the endpoints or step are NaN.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.

    • integralFixedStep

      public <T extends Function<Double, Double>> double integralFixedStep(T func, double leftEndpoint, double rightEndpoint, int littleRangeNumber)
      Approximates the definite integral of a single-variable function over a specified interval using the trapezoidal rule with a fixed number of subintervals.
      指定者:
      integralFixedStep 在接口中 IntegralBase
      参数:
      func - The function to integrate, represented as a Function无效输入：'<'Double, Double>.
      leftEndpoint - The left endpoint of the integration interval.
      rightEndpoint - The right endpoint of the integration interval.
      littleRangeNumber - The number of subintervals to divide the interval into.
      返回:
      The approximate value of the definite integral.
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - If the function is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the endpoints are not in the range of the function, or if any of the endpoints or the number of subintervals are NaN.
      ArithmeticException - If an arithmetic error occurs during integration.
